about.title: About
about.subtitle: Discover my experience, skills, and passions. Learn what drives me.

skills.react_description: I design, implement and maintain various React applications. I take care of efficient state management, design, dynamic testing and deployments. I use technologies like Redux, Material UI, REST API, GraphQL and React Native on a daily basis.
skills.nodejs_description: I create backend applications in Node.js. I manage databases, create APIs and servers. I use technologies like Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, REST API and GraphQL in my work.
skills.javascript_description: I know JavaScript from scratch. I create scripts, web and server applications. I use technologies like ES6, TypeScript, Babel, Webpack and NPM in my work.

services.title: What I do
services.subtitle: I create modern web and mobile applications tailored to your needs.

content.subtitle_projects: An overview of my highlighted personal and professional projects, organized by technology. Take a look at what I've worked on.

footer.title: Contact
footer.subtitle: Feel free to contact me any time. I will get back to you as soon as i can!
